textPlain: This one blows my mind.Discovery was kept in as close to as-flown condition as possible to be the vehicle of record for future research.  No museum on the planet is better equipped to handle things like that than the Smithsonian.Hopefully the title transfer is enough to protect it from moving.  Certainly 80 million isn't enough to restore an SCA and construct a building to house the orbiter.
I will give a little laugh if Houston ends up with a space shuttle Columbia memorial.
